summary: WHILE DRIVING AND BRAKES ARE APPLIED, THE STEERING WHEEL WILL VIBRATE THEN THERE'S A NOISE (PLACE UNKNOWN)AND VEHICLE WILL HAVE EXTENDED STOPPING DISTANCE.  PROBLEM WILL WORSEN WHEN DRIVING IN WET CONDITIONS.  THE DEALERSHIP CANNOT FIX THE PROBLEM, AND THEY INDICATED  THAT THE ABS BRAKES ARE THE CAUSE OF THE PROBLEM. TS
